Start: ^Oscar Herman: "Sir. A giant lily pad was floating down the river and on it is a giant frog."
Welcome_Frog: ^You welcome the frog giving up some food but it teaches the Fisherman some tricks.
^You lose 10 food but gain +1 food production.
Kick_Frog: ^You kick the frog out of your town and you make it angry.
^The frog steals fish from the river giving it -1 food production.
Recruit_Frog: ^You recruit the frog giving it 25 food and recieving a new villager.
^The fisherman recieves a new teacher, giving +3 food production.
